statements.select: select * from ProduceOtherCompactDetail where ProduceOtherCompactId=#value# and (DetailsFlag<>2 or DetailsFlag is null)
select * from ProduceOtherCompactDetail where ProduceOtherCompactId=#value# and OtherCompactCount- isnull(InDepotCount,0)<>0
select isnull(sum(OtherCompactCount),0) from ProduceOtherCompactDetail where MPSDetailId=#value#

select * from ProduceOtherCompactDetail where InvoiceXOId in (select InvoiceXOId from InvoiceXO where (CustomerId in(select CustomerId from customer where (id>=#startcustomerid# or #startcustomerid# is null) and (id<= #endcustomerid# or #endcustomerid# is null)) )) and ProduceOtherCompactId in (select ProduceOtherCompactId from ProduceOtherCompact where ProduceOtherCompactDate between #startdate# and #enddate# )

SELECT * FROM ProduceOtherCompactDetail detail INNER JOIN ProduceOtherCompact pc ON pc.ProduceOtherCompactId = detail.ProduceOtherCompactId WHERE ((pc.ProduceOtherCompactId>=#cid1# OR #cid1# IS NULL) AND (pc.ProduceOtherCompactId<=#cid2# OR #cid2# IS NULL)) AND((pc.ProduceOtherCompactDate>=#startdate# OR #startdate# IS null) AND (pc.ProduceOtherCompactDate<=#enddate# OR #enddate# IS NULL)) AND detail.ProductId IN (SELECT ProductId FROM Product WHERE (ProductName>=#pid0# OR #pid0# IS NULL) AND (ProductName<=#pid1# OR #pid1# IS NULL)) AND (pc.SupplierId IN (SELECT SupplierId FROM Supplier WHERE (Id>=#sid0# OR #sid0# IS NULL) AND (Id<=#sid1# OR #sid1# IS NULL)) or pc.SupplierId is null)

SELECT * FROM ProduceOtherCompactDetail WHERE ProduceOtherCompactId IN(SELECT ProduceOtherCompactId FROM ProduceOtherCompact WHERE ProduceOtherCompactDate>=DateAdd(Month,-3,getdate())) order by ProduceOtherCompactId desc

SELECT * FROM ProduceOtherCompactDetail WHERE ProduceOtherCompactId IN(SELECT ProduceOtherCompactId FROM ProduceOtherCompact WHERE ProduceOtherCompactDate between #startdate# and #enddate#) order by ProduceOtherCompactId desc

select * from ProduceOtherCompactDetail where ProduceOtherCompactId=#ProduceOtherCompactDetail# and productId in(select productId from product where (ProductName>=#StartpId# or #StartpId# is null) and (ProductName<=#EndpId# or #EndpId# is null))
